value.stringValue: There was an error during the creation of the service request record!!
Record created successfully. Activity statuses are updated after 1 minute. {url} to open the new service request.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_Message
fields.fieldText: {!Loop_through_all_parameters.Name} is required and should be {!Loop_through_all_parameters.Required_answer_to_continue__c}. You entered {!For_each_asset_parameter.Yes_No_Input__c}. The Service Request will not be created.

fields.name: MessageForAsset
fields.fieldText: {!Loop_through_all_parameters.Name} is required and should be {!Loop_through_all_parameters.Required_answer_to_continue__c}. The current status of the asset is {!For_each_asset_parameter.Yes_No_Input__c}. The Service Request will not be created.

fields.name: I_would_like_to_receive_an_e_mail_when_the_required_parameter_is_fulfilled_withi
fields.fieldText: I would like to receive an e-mail when the required parameter is fulfilled within 30 days!

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Message
fields.fieldText:
{!Loop_through_parameters_to_check_if_required.Name} is required.

Return to the Previous screen and provide a value for this parameter.
